title: help me choose
body:
id like to learn and become good at a champion. I dont like bot so i only want mid or top or jungle champions. help me choose?

i dont want warwick hecarim skarner or annie since i already play those champions alot

replies.body: Elise is pretty fun for jungle
I've decided to go with wukong top as i find him very fun to play
Zed mid would help you more aware of your surroundings since you will have to keep track of your shadows. Shen top for more teammate awareness. I say lee sin jungle c:
Dr. Mundo, Tahm Kench, volibear, wukong, chogath are all pretty fun and easy champs that suit these roles

Well I personally recommend Lux and Ahri(my mains mid):D Lux has super long range and a countless number of times ive been able to kill people on full health whilst i had very little just because of the safe range she has. Also what's not to like about a 27.5 sec huge range lazer?:D As for ahri, the way her ult works is a total life saver for me, you can reposition yourself and get out of trouble, or just use your 3 flashes to chase down an opponent(theyll never get away:P)! Ahri's q also does TRUE DAMAGE, sounds good?:P

Here's my picks for low elo people like you and me:

+ **Jungle:** {{champion:32}} Amumu, {{champion:106}} Volibear and {{champion:2}} Olaf (he also works top).

+ ** Top:** {{champion:98}} Shen, {{champion:86}} Garen and {{champion:54}} Malphite (be sure to take Grasp of the Undying mastery).

+ **Mid:** {{champion:90}} Malzahar, {{champion:99}} Lux and {{champion:8}} Vladmir.

Or just this guy {{champion:17}} for everything :D

Don't get too hung up on champion picks though, honestly at below gold anything can work. But if you want something to help you out use these 2 sites. [Here](http://www.lolking.net/champions) and [here](http://www.nerfplz.com/2015/12/2015-champion-tier-list-solo-queue.html).

The first site gives you winrates, and will tell you how often that champion is winning. The second site is a tier list, and will tell you how impactful that champion is.

Warwick, Hecarim, Skarner, Annie. So you like the "game changing" Ults?
